caption.p: I2S key concepts and lines of effort. Adapted from Air Force Infrastructure Investment Strategy (I2S), September 25, 2018, pp. 2, 4.
New I2SM concept framework. This figure depicts the concepts recommended to align with the USAF priorities to build the framework for a strategic-level infrastructure investment model.
